subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Losing Víctor Zambrano, a maddeningly inconsistent but experienced starter, to a season-ending elbow injury has exposed their lack of pitching depth and cast the Mets' rotation into disarray.
snippet: Losing Víctor Zambrano, a maddeningly inconsistent but experienced starter, to a season-ending elbow injury has exposed their lack of pitching depth and cast the Mets' rotation into disarray.
